news.title: Tariffs aren't dealing a huge blow to big retailers and consumers — yet. Here are key earnings takeaways
news.summary: Consumer spending has largely stayed strong so far. The pinch from higher duties hasn't been as severe as some companies had feared. The U.S. economy is expected to grow at a strong rate in the second quarter.

news.title: Fed Chair Powell set to deliver big Jackson Hole speech Friday. Here's what Wall Street expects
news.summary: Powell is set to deliver what almost certainly will be his last keynote address at the central bank's annual conclave. Powell is expected to speak at the conclave on Thursday.

news.title: FBI raids home of John Bolton, former Trump national security advisor
news.summary: FBI Director Kash Patel tweeted “NO ONE is above the law… @FBI agents on mission" as agents searched the home of John Bolton.

news.title: Cracker Barrel faces social media pushback on new logo, brand refresh
news.summary: Shares of Cracker Barrel dropped roughly 7% on Thursday. The restaurant unveiled its new logo earlier this week as part of a larger brand refresh.

news.title: John Deere faces a crossroads amid decreasing demand, increasing investments
news.summary: John Deere has reported significant hits from weaker agricultural demand. Wall Street still sees optimism for the company's road ahead. John Deere shares are up 2.7% this year, the biggest gain in the Dow Jones Industrial Average.

news.title: I’m a widow living off Social Security. I have $200K in a brokerage account, so why am I ignored?
news.summary: “I had to hunt high and low to have them sell my Tesla stock because it was tanking,” he said. “I was like, ‘What is going on?’”

news.title: As a nurse, I’ve seen people use their power of attorney to take advantage of their parents. Watch out for these warnings.
news.summary: “Even if someone has millions of dollars in retirement, that won’t keep them from being trapped in the hospital,” he says.

news.title: Have critics gotten the Trump tariffs all wrong? Here’s a case for why they will help the economy.
news.summary: The U.S. is moving away from free trade, at least under the Trump administration. “Managed trade” is in, and it might not be all that bad for the United States.

news.title: ‘I learned a hard lesson’: My ex-husband gambled away our $900,000 life savings. Do I use my 401(k) to buy a home?
news.summary: “I have about $80,000 in my 401(k) and $10,00 in savings,” she says. “I’m very happy.”

news.title: Cracker Barrel’s logo change sparks fury, online and on Wall Street
news.summary: More than 558,000 posts on social media including Donald Trump Jr. ‘When people love a brand, they don’t always like change,’  a branding expert says.
